Chapter 2 Systems 2.1 Spark 2.1.1 Spark with Python 2.1.1.1 Preparation The following online learnings can be used to get used to the pySpark bindings for Apache Spark. After obtaining access to the mentioned platform you have to join those courses manually. No. Platform Name 1 Datacamp Introduction to PySpark 2 Datacamp Big Data Fundamentals with PySpark 3 Datacamp Cleaning Data with PySpark 4 Datacamp Feature Engineering with PySpark 5 Datacamp Machine Learning with PySpark 2.1.1.2 Tutorial The following tutorial requires a Spark Instance to run the commands. The easiest way to emulate a cluster is with the following docker image. docker run -p 10000:8888 quay.io/jupyter/all-spark No. Topic Download 1 PySpark Tutorial Code-Along IPNB 2 PySpark Tutorial Full IPNB 2.1.2 Spark with R tbd
